short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: No Tension to ready NREGA files

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SONASHANKAR IT SOLUTIONS INDIA (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED (earlier known as GPSoftwares Solutions) brings you nDocuSoft that make your NREGA work allocation a breeze. No Tension to ready files at click of button.  The current features include form generation for Cover page, Check list, Demand application form (Form 6) (reprint), Work allocation form (Form 8), Form 9, Work completion certificate, NMR Movement form and work order. It is all made simple by nDocuSoft.
